title: Invitation template body text
content:
Here's the sample (again)  
 [Wedding invitation](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317171817/http:/apracticalwedding.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/01/VintageDestination-780x780.jpg)

What is the font used for the body of the invitation "WE JOYFULLY ..." ?

Font: 

 Brandon Grotesque 

Solved By: 

 [kthomps5](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317171817/http:/typophile.com/user/175823 "View user profile.")
author: expadawan

comments.content:
Brandon Grotesque seems a likely candidate:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/hvdfonts/brandon-grotesque/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317171817/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/hvdfonts/brandon-grotesque/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/hvdfonts/brandon-grotesque/")
Many thanks, you guys are really quick : )
